lead_paragraph: Ryan Lochte and three other American swimmers were robbed at gunpoint early Sunday by thieves posing as police officers who stopped their taxi and took their money and belongings.

headline.main: Lochte: US Swimmers Are 'Safe and Unharmed' After Robbery
headline.print_headline: Lochte: US Swimmers Are 'Safe and Unharmed' After Robbery

snippet: Ryan Lochte and three other American swimmers were robbed at gunpoint early Sunday by thieves posing as police officers who stopped their taxi and took their money and belongings....
